version_description: Thanks for using PGPro! This release includes the following changes:New: Generate PGP keys directly from within PGProNew: Import keys from filesNew: Export keychain as GPG keyring fileNew: Send .asc files directly to PGProFixed: Some PGP keys caused PGPro

Thanks for using PGPro!
This release includes the following changes:

New: Integration with OpenPGP Keyserver
New: Option to add key from clipboard
New: Option to import GPG Keyring files
New: Ability to search local keychain
